org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.expr
Interface IAeExpressionAnalyzer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractExpressionAnalyzer, AeNoOpExpressionAnalyzer
public interface IAeExpressionAnalyzer

This interface should be implemented in order to provide an implementation of an expression util (used by the AWF Designer to analyze and manipulate expressions). An expression util object is capable of doing various miscellaneous tasks on an expression found in a BPEL process. The AWF Designer often has need to analyze the structure of an expression in order to implement certain features (for example, the ability to search for all uses of a Variable). Each expression language must provide an implementation of this interface in order for the Designer to be fully functional with respect to BPEL processes that utilize expressions written in that language.

Nested Class Summary
static class IAeExpressionAnalyzer.AeExpressionToSpecDetails
          A class that holds the result of parsing an expression to-spec.

renameVariable

public java.lang.String renameVariable(IAeExpressionAnalyzerContext aContext,
                                       java.lang.String aExpression,
                                       java.lang.String aOldVarName,
                                       java.lang.String aNewVarName)
This method is called to rename a variable that is used in an expression. The method is called with the expression to modify, the old name of the variable, the new name of the variable, and the util context. The method will return a new expression if it has been altered or null if no changes were made.

Parameters:
aContext -
aExpression -
aOldVarName -
aNewVarName -

renameNamespacePrefix

public java.lang.String renameNamespacePrefix(IAeExpressionAnalyzerContext aContext,
                                              java.lang.String aExpression,
                                              java.lang.String aOldPrefix,
                                              java.lang.String aNewPrefix)
This method is called to rename a namespace prefix that is used in the expression. The method is called with the expression to modify, the old namespace prefix, the new namespace prefix, and the util context. The method will return a new (modified) expression if it has been altered or null if no changes were made.

Parameters:
aContext -
aExpression -
aOldPrefix -
aNewPrefix -

parseExpressionToSpec

public IAeExpressionAnalyzer.AeExpressionToSpecDetails parseExpressionToSpec(IAeExpressionAnalyzerContext aContext,
                                                                             java.lang.String aExpression)
This method is called to parse an expression to-spec and return the expression's component parts. See the documentation for AeExpressionToSpecDetails for more details. If the expression is not a valid to-spec expression (based on language specific restrictions), then this method should return null.

Parameters:
aContext -
aExpression -
Throws:
AeBpelException
